title: Is a rented room (Musallah) considered as Masjid? Can women enter it during menses? assim al hakeem
transcript: uh I have a question regarding that was it called like is a Masid considered like a Masid if they for example they there's a place where it's normally like an apartment and then they just renting out like a room like the like a small part of the building is it considered like a Masid no this is called a it is called a prayer Hall and when you enter it it is not mandatory for you to pray two ra because this is not a Masjid and it can also be um admitted by women who are in their Menses this is just a prayer Hall it doesn't have the sanctuary of a full-fledged Masjid that was a w endowment that was devoted totally for Allah it can't be sold it can't be rented it can't be gifted or inherited
